0x06D26A96CA1BCA75.name: _SET_PED_MOTIVATION
0x06D26A96CA1BCA75.comment:
enum eMotivationState
{
	TOILET_STATE,
	FEAR_STATE,
	ANGRY_STATE,
	AGITATION_STATE,
	HUNGRY_STATE,
	TIRED_STATE,
	SAD_STATE,
	BRAVE_STATE,
	OFFER_ITEM_STATE,
	SUSPICION,
	DRUNK_STATE
};

If targetPed is set to 0 the ped motivationState affects everyone
